RelatedSentence: A Vandegrift High School student has been arrested after he brought an unloaded gun to school , officials said .
A Vandegrift High School student has been arrested after he brought an unloaded gun to school , officials said .

The 17 - year - old was taken into custody Monday morning after the student was found in possession of a small caliber hand gun at the Northwest Austin school , principal Charlie Little said in a letter to parents .
There was no ammunition in the gun and no students or staff were in any danger at any time , he said .
Officials are still investigating why he brought the gun to school .

A1: a small caliber hand gun at the Northwest Austin school
